reviewText: Works as advertised, easy no problems

I bought this for my 3 year old grandson who looooves Nascar. Where he lives, he doesn't have tv. The reviews stated this was a high quality video. Well, let me tell you. It's not even close. I am so disappointed.

This is the full TV broadcast (without the commercials).  So if you want to see a race as it was originally broadcast and not edited features...this is what you want.  There are some sporting events you want to keep and that are worth watching again.  This is the best way to accomplish that.
I DON'T KNOW WHY NASCAR DOES NOT PRINT VIDEOS ON BLU RAY.NASCAR HAS PROBABLY THE BEST PRODUCTION FOR AUTO RACING AND NO BLU RAY?I DON'T KNOW?

I had to buy the DVD because i was at this event

It's fantastic. Works at its finest. And a true Cinderella story to watch!
This was a no brainer for us to buy since we were there and saw tha race live.  Nice remembrance.
I bought this for my dad for Father's Day, I placed the order on a Sunday and he had it by Thursday, much earlier than I anticipated!  The price was very fair also.
Great way to remember this historic race. The video is great quality as is the audio. A must have for Nascar Fans.
